Your friend wants to paraphrase the following sentence:
The flowers were put in the vase by the man.

Your friend can choose fro the following list of sentences:
Man the by vase the in put were flowers the.
The man put the flowers in the vase.
Which sentence should your friend choose?

Your answer:

My friend should choose
interpretation_target: He took the flowers and put them in the vase.
interpretation_competitor: Man the by vase the in put were flowers the.
interpretation_distractor: The woman bought flowers and also bought a small vase.
